dmca.title: Copyright Infringement

**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below, please find the original complaint:

ATTN: Google, Inc.

Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]

Mountain View, CA, [private], USA

Fax: [private]

 

FROM:[private]

Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.

[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi,[private], P.R.C.

Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]

E-mail: [private]@gmail.com

 

SUBJ: Copyright infringement

DATE: September 28, 2007

 

Dear Google, Inc.

 

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

 

The offender is en.tibettour.com.cn. They copied 25 pages of contents from our website without our permission. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages from your search result.

 

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website:

 

(1)Search Query “Barkhor Area tibettour” 

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010605192957/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/barkhor.htm   (our June 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/200402004427113139.htm      (Their content from the second paragraph copied our entire content.)

 

(2)Search Query “Jokhang Monastery tibettour” 

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020209025116/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/jokhang.htm   (our February 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/200402004427112732.htm     (Their third and fourth paragraphs copied our second and last paragraphs.)

 

(3)Search Query “Sera Monastery tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010605203931/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/sera.htm   (our June 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/..%5Ccityguides/200402004427101346.htm  (Their third paragraph copied our first paragraph by deleting the first two sentences.)

 

(4) Search Query “Norbulingka, meaning Jewel Park tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20011114213100/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/norbulingka.htm   (our November 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/..%5Ccityguides/200402004427124651.htm    (Their second paragraph copied our second paragraph.)

 

(5) Search Query “Yangpachen tibettour” 

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010821034930/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/yabajing.htm   (our August 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/200402004427125900.htm    (Their second paragraph copied our first paragraph.)

 

(6) Search Query “Dzong Fortress tibettour” 

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/gyangtse/fort.htm  

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/..%5Ccityguides/200402004427142153.htm

 

(7) Search Query “Zhangmu Town tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010620062054/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/zhangmu/zhangmu.htm  (our June 2001 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/..%5Ccityguides/200402004427143420.htm  

 

(8) Search Query “Tholing Monastery tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020218124515/http://travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/ngari/tholing.htm  (our February 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/cityguides/..%5Ccityguides/200402004427131625.htm 

 

(9) Search Query “Tholing Monastery tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20020218124515/http://travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/ngari/tholing.htm  (our February 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/geography/20041200581794855.htm

 

(10) Search Query “Brief Intro to the Tourist Visa tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021227145901/http://travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/travel-documents.htm   (our December 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/20040200461492754.htm  (Their second paragraph copied our entire content.)

 

(11) Search Query “Travel Documents tibettour”   (see ‘More results from en.tibettour.com..cn’ )

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021227145901/http://travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/travel-documents.htm    (Our December 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/20040200458172754.htm 

 

(12) Search Query “money tibettour”   (see ‘More results from en.tibettour.com..cn’ )

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/money.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/20040200458174120.htm 

 

(13) Search Query “Tibetan Language ABC tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/language.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/20040200458174353.htm

 

(14) Search Query “Tibet Airports & fee tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021219055253/http://travelchinaguide.com/essential/airport-fee.htm   (our December 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/200402004617135134.htm   (Their last paragraph copied our entire content.)

 

(15) Search Query “Hospitals tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/hospitals.htm  

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/20040200458180839.htm    (Their first six paragraphs copied our corresponding content.)

 

(16) Search Query “Post, Communications and Internet in Tibet”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/communication.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/essentials/..%5Cessentials/2004020045983320.htm

 

(17) Search Query “Shopping overview tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/shopping.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/Shopping/..%5Cshopping/200402004525145759.htm

 

(18) Search Query “Tibetan Medicine tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/cityguides/tibet/tibetan-medicine.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/shopping/200402004525155822.htm    (Their content of Tibetan Medicine copied our entire content.)

 

(19) Search Query “Currency tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021204211057/http://travelchinaguide.com/essential/money-matter.htm   (our December 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/advisories/..%5Cadvisories/200402004510143736.htm   (Content of their Chinese Currency, Foreign Currencies That Can Be Exchanged in China, Credit Cards, Traveler's Cheques and Relevant Provisions on Currency copied our content of RMB,  Currency Converter, Credit Card and ATMs, Traveler's Cheques and Currency Regulations respectively.)

 

(20) Search Query “Customs tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/essential/customs.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/advisories/..%5Cadvisories/200402004510144233.htm

(Their content of Red and Green Channels copied our entire content.)

 

(21) Search Query “Yangpachen tibettour”  (see ‘More results from en.tibettour.com..cn’ )

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20010605203931/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/sera.htm

http://web.archive.org/web/20020209025116/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/jokhang.htm

http://web.archive.org/web/20010605192957/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/barkhor.htm

http://web.archive.org/web/20011114213100/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/norbulingka.htm

http://web.archive.org/web/20010821034930/http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/yabajing.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/geography/200412005721105459.htm

(Their third paragraph of Sera Monastery copied the first paragraph of our first page above; their last two paragraphs of Jokhang Monastery copied the second and last paragraphs of our second page above; content of their Barkhor area copied the third page above; their second paragraph of Norbulingka copied the second paragraph of our fourth page above; content of their Yangpachen copied the first paragraph of our fifth page above.)

 

(22) Search Query “Butter sculpture tibettour”   (see ‘More results from en.tibettour.com.cn’)

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/cityguides/tibet/butter-sculpture.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/200402004430101058.htm

 

(23) Search Query “Tsa-Tsa tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://www.travelchinaguide.com/cityguides/tibet/tsa-tsa.htm

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/custom/..%5Ccustom/200402004430100946.htm

 

(24) Search Query “Tourist Visa and Permits for Entrance in Tibet tibettour”

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021227145901/http://travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/travel-documents.htm    (our December 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/advisories/200402004510142315.htm     (Their second paragraph copied our entire content.)

 

(25) Search Query “Tourist Visa and Permits for Entrance in Tibet tibettour”  (see ‘More results from en,tibettour.com.cn’)

Our Copyrighted Page:

http://web.archive.org/web/20021227145901/http://travelchinaguide.com/essential/tibet/travel-documents.htm    (our December 2002 version)

Infringing Web Page:

http://en.tibettour.com.cn/geography/20041200661105924.htm     (Their second paragraph of Reply copied our entire content.)

 

3. My contact information:

[private]

[private]@gmail.com

www.travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.

[private]

[private]

Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.

 

4. The contact info of the copyright offender en.tibettour.com.cn is:

   Email:[private]@tibet.cn

Tel: [private]

Fax: [private]

 

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

Thank you very much!

 

Yours sincerely,

 

[private]

 

Ps.: According to your instruction, all our copyright complaint can be sent to you only via email. Please refer to our faxed document to you on July 6th, 2007.
